title: Beaming
description:
Karl Ravech and Buster discuss the Home Run Derby, Julio Rodríguez announcing his arrival, Pete Alonso’s off night, Albert Pujols stealing the show, Juan Soto looking comfortable on the field and what Buster’s hearing on the possibility of a Soto trade. Then, Kylie McDaniel on the MLB Draft, the betting odds shifting before the first pick and the curious case of Kumar Rocker. Later, Todd Radom stops by to share his thoughts on the All-Star uniforms, deliver the Phantom Franchise and administer the weekly quiz.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
